content: crochet peep hole doily - starting with a magic_ring and made in rounds you will soon have some of these made to decorate your tables the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 11 inches diameter level intermediate copyright ©2023 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-peep-hole-doily/
